title: Potato fritters with Emmental cheese
ingredients: ['650g waxy potatoes, peeled and grated', '100g cream cheese', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '60g Emmental cheese, grated', '1/2 onion, grated', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons oil']
